bug.author: Bart1909
bug.summary: No zip download possible for shared links
bug.description: When using a shared link I'm only able to download single pictures. When selecting multiple images and clicking on the download button, a login is required. Is there a way to enable the download of multiple files for shared links OR to disable the download button, when multiple images are selected?

comments.comment: Good catch, should be fixed with the next build in about one hour :)
Works with the new version! Thank you :)
